name: Valentino's Trouble in Paradise
description: On a sunny day in the middle of an extraordinarily warm summer, a small Jack Russell/Chihuahua mix pup named Valentino finds himself in great distress. He is forced to face his two mightiest enemies, a neighborhood cat, and an annoying squirrel, to face the odds and get back what they’ve taken and what he loves the most, a bright neon tennis ball. They’ve come together and gathered a gang of other cats and squirrels to team up against Valentino. He has to face them all by himself, in order to redeem what he has lost.
